name: ShapeRoller Arcade
description:
ShapeRoller Arcade is  a game that is designed from the ground up to be played over and over again while you wait for other (probably better) games to load! Gain points with a small twist, each time you get a point a new enemy spawns, and the game speeds up!

We also have an official discord! Here it is! Feel free to join and post your highscores, and in the future, show off your fancy skins!
